energy: You often reflect internally before sharing your thoughts.
It's easy to interact with another human being.
You prefer to sleep in rather than hanging out.
After a busy week, you need some alone time to recharge.
Being in a crowd with unfamiliar faces makes you uneasy.
info: You can easily detect patterns in any scenario.
Deriving formulae often works out better than just memorizing them.
You live in the future more than the present.
A hint is far more acceptable than a direct solution.
You trust what’s proven to be true over what might actually be true.
decision: Logicality is far superior than mere feelings.
You are always sympathetic to those in need.
Being direct is often better than sugarcoating things.
You value fairness over other's feelings when making decisions.
lifestyle: Failure to plan is planning to fail.
You code without drawing a flow-chart or writing a pseudocode first.
You like to do stuff last-minute.
You hate sudden changes in your life.
A sudden change of plan beyond your control can break your mood.
People who doesn't follow your plans irritate you.
